# Pull Request template

Short description
-----------------
Guidance for contributors opening pull requests to this documentation repository.

## Summary
Describe the change in one or two sentences.

## Related issue
Link to an issue if one exists (e.g., `#123`).

## What changed
- List the files or areas updated and a short rationale.

## Checklist
- [ ] Small focused change (one topic per PR)
- [ ] Follows `STYLE_GUIDE.md`
- [ ] Internal links validated
- [ ] Example or snippet tested (if applicable)

## How to review
- Suggested reviewer(s) and any context to check.

## Notes
- Add any other notes for reviewers or follow-ups.
